column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Was disappointed by my experience here this weekend.  I have been here several times
column3: I actually had a FANTASTIC experience
column4: so I was quite disappointed at the poor service AND the mediocre food.  What happened Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba??  You went from one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago to one that I'm not sure I will come back to.
